snippet: Twenty-five fans, most of them high school students from Long Island who were grounded by Hurricane Sandy, were initially told they would not be able to exchange their tickets if they missed Monday night's Nets game.
abstract: Twenty-five fans, most of them high school students from Long Island who were grounded by Hurricane Sandy, were initially told they would not be able to exchange their tickets if they missed Monday night's Nets game.

headline.main: Hoping to Save a Lost Field Trip
